original_text: I pray that God Almighty will bless you. I pray that he will give you many children, so that your descendants become a large nation of people.
korean_text: 전능하신 하나님이 네게 복을 주시어 네가 생육하고 번성하게 하여 네가 여러 족속을 이루게 하시고

sentences.original_text: I pray that God Almighty will bless you
I pray that he will give you many children
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신에게 많은 자녀를 주시기를 기도합니다

sentences.original_text: so that your descendants become a large nation of people
